About Me

Ann Brody is a PhD student studying blockchain communities and decentralization from a communication studies and anthropoligical perspective. Her current research interests revolve around Ethereum devs, techno-thanatology, immortality, cryogenic technoligies and biohacking.
She also dabbles with NFTs in her spare time.
